title: simplehuman mini sensor mirror: lighted makeup & vanity mirror
description: Our mini sensor mirror lights up automatically. Its 10x magnification is ideal for close-up work like tweezing or applying eye makeup. Its tru-lux light system simulates natural sunlight, allowing you to see full color variation, so you'll know when your makeup is color-correct and flawless. The mirror folds down flat and stores easily in its travel case.

Our mini sensor mirror lights up automatically. Its 10x magnification is ideal for close-up work like tweezing or applying eye makeup. Its tru-lux light system simulates natural sunlight, allowing you to see full color variation, so you'll know when your makeup is color-correct and flawless. asset.author: simplehuman

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING]

This is the mini sensor mirror. It's got 10 times magnification which is great for close up work like tweezing or applying eye makeup. It's smart it lights up automatically as you approach and shuts off when you walk away. It's also brighter clearer and more color correct than normal mirrors. More than twice as bright as the next best while closely simulating natural sunlight for true to life color correct detail. You'll never have to change a bulb because the LEDs will last a life time. The mirror is cordless and recharges with USB. In fact, one charge will last up to eight weeks. It foldS down flat into this nifty travel case. It's easy to look good with our sensor mirror and now it;s easy to take with you too.
